mapper.sql: ID, COURSEPROMOTION_ID, COURSE_ID, COURSEPROMOTION_COURSEID, CATEGORY_ID, COURSEPROMOTION_CATEGORYID, CREATE_TIME, COURSEPROMOTION_CREATETIME, START_TIME, COURSEPROMOTION_STARTTIME, END_TIME, COURSEPROMOTION_ENDTIME, STATUS, COURSEPROMOTION_STATUS, DELETED, COURSEPROMOTION_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into COURSE_PROMOTION
COURSE_ID,
CATEGORY_ID,
CREATE_TIME,
START_TIME,
END_TIME,
STATUS,
DELETED,
#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update COURSE_PROMOTION set DELETED = 1 where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update COURSE_PROMOTION
COURSE_ID = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
START_TIME = #{startTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
END_TIME = #{endTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
